Articles.Content:
So I made it to JOOL!

I was very chuffed.

Clicked end flight.

Darn it.

http://s1284.photobucket.com/user/rockbloodystar/media/screenshot17_zpsb13d0d78.png.html?sort=3&o=0

This is where growing up as a save-scummer comes in handy. I've caught myself hitting "end flight" a few times. Sometimes, though, I'm lucky enough to have made a quicksave right before I was dumb enough to do it.
